note:
Making the world better, one note at a time. A classical composer with a passion for medieval and Renaissance music. Two main themes permeate many of my works – music composed in an attempt to translate something about the nature of the physical world and music composed to inspire and promote world peace. If you enjoy the music you hear on my website and want to collaborate, let's chat! Member: Recording Academy, ASCAP #classicalmusic #composer
